scripts.schema:compile: ajv compile -c ajv-formats --spec=draft2020 -s schema/aimtable.v1.schema.json -r schema/types.common.v1.schema.json && ajv compile -c ajv-formats --spec=draft2020 -s schema/hierarchy.v1.schema.json -r schema/types.common.v1.schema.json && ajv compile -c ajv-formats --spec=draft2020 -s schema/plannerbundle.v1.schema.json -r schema/types.common.v1.schema.json
scripts.schema:validate: ajv validate -c ajv-formats --spec=draft2020 -s schema/aimtable.v1.schema.json -r schema/types.common.v1.schema.json -d examples/aimtable.v1.pass.json && ajv validate -c ajv-formats --spec=draft2020 -s schema/hierarchy.v1.schema.json -r schema/types.common.v1.schema.json -d examples/hierarchy.v1.pass.json && ajv validate -c ajv-formats --spec=draft2020 -s schema/plannerbundle.v1.schema.json -r schema/types.common.v1.schema.json -d examples/plannerbundle.v1.pass.json
scripts.schema:validate:fail: ajv validate -c ajv-formats --spec=draft2020 -s schema/aimtable.v1.schema.json -r schema/types.common.v1.schema.json -d examples/aimtable.v1.fail.missing-item.json || true && ajv validate -c ajv-formats --spec=draft2020 -s schema/hierarchy.v1.schema.json -r schema/types.common.v1.schema.json -d examples/hierarchy.v1.fail.micros-as-strings.json || true && ajv validate -c ajv-formats --spec=draft2020 -s schema/plannerbundle.v1.schema.json -r schema/types.common.v1.schema.json -d examples/plannerbundle.v1.fail.bad-callout.json || true
scripts.schema:test: npm run schema:compile && npm run schema:validate && npm run schema:validate:fail
scripts.import:example:aimtable: cat examples/aimtable.v1.pass.json | node importer/cli.js --mode stdin --type aimtable
scripts.import:example:hierarchy: cat examples/hierarchy.v1.pass.json | node importer/cli.js --mode stdin --type hierarchy
scripts.import:example:planner: cat examples/plannerbundle.v1.pass.json | node importer/cli.js --mode stdin --type plannerbundle
